About.title: About
About.subtitle: Kryfal
About.description: Experts in Threat Intelligence and digital investigations, protecting companies against advanced cyber threats. Kryfal was born from the observation that the sectors forming the backbone of the economy are the most neglected in cyber intelligence. While the market focuses on generic threats, we dive into the specific ecosystems of Agribusiness, Ports, Aerospace, and the new Web3 economy, delivering intelligence managers can use to make strategic decisions and protect their most valuable assets.

Posicionamento.title: Our Positioning
Posicionamento.description: Effective threat intelligence does not exist without a deep understanding of the business. Kryfal positions itself at the intersection of cyber expertise and the operational reality of the most critical sectors. Instead of offering generic solutions, we dive into your value chain to understand who the threat actors are, how they think, and how they operate to compromise your business continuity.
